doc:
Valerie Perrine https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valerie_Perrine 0 Valerie Ritchie Perrine (born September 3, 1943) is a retired American actress and model. For her role as Honey Bruce in the 1974 film Lenny, she won the BAFTA Award for Most Promising Newcomer to Leading Film Roles, the Cannes Film Festival Award for Best Actress, and was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress. Her other film appearances include Superman (1978), The Electric Horseman (1979), and Superman II (1980). Valerie_Ritchie_Perrine ( born September_3_,_1943 ) is a_retired_American_actress_and_model . For her_role as Honey_Bruce in the_1974_film_Lenny , she won the_BAFTA_Award for Most_Promising_Newcomer to Leading_Film_Roles , the_Cannes_Film_Festival_Award for_Best_Actress , and was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actress . Her_other_film_appearances include Superman_(_1978_) , The_Electric_Horseman_(_1979_) , and Superman_II ( 1980_) .
